subject: Dear Pena-Rios, A; Khosmood, F, It is Our Honor to Invite You to Become the Lead Guest Editor of Your Proposed Special Issue
body:
Being the Lead Guest Editor American Journal of Software Engineering and Applications ISSN Online: 2327-249X ISSN Print: 2327-2473 Current Issue: Vol.8, No.1, 2019 Dear Pena-Rios, A; Khosmood, F, We are sending you this invitation to propose a special issue on valuable topics within the scope of American Journal of Software Engineering and Applications (http://www.ajsea.org). Initate Special Issues After reading your article "Immersive Learning Technologies: Research and Future Directions J.UCS Special Issue" published in JOURNAL OF UNIVERSAL COMPUTER SCIENCE, we believe that more in-depth researches can be conducted around this topic. For this reason, it's our pleasure to invite you to propose a special issue on a topic of your interest. The Guides of Proposing Your Special Issues The written proposals that include the introduction to the special issue and some key topics that papers could focus upon are requested to be submitted by the prospective lead guest editor. If you have interests, please click the following link for the Proposal Form: http://www.ajsea.org/download/60Form.doc Your Role as the Lead Guest Editor for the Special Issue If your special issue proposal is adopted, you will act as the Lead Guest Editor. The Lead Guest Editor manages the entire Special Issue process, which comprises recruiting Guest Editors, composing a Special Issue proposal and regulating the peer review of submitted articles. Benefits of Serving as the Lead Guest Editor of Your Special Issue 1. One of your papers submitted to the special issue can enjoy free publication 2. Receiving an electronic version of the Certificate of Honor 3. You'll have the chance of being promoted to the Journal's Editor-in-Chief 4. Keeping up with the recent research achievements via the review of manuscripts in your field Any questions are welcome, please feel free to contact us. Best regards, Editorial Office of American Journal of Software Engineering and Applications


Being the Lead Guest Editor
American Journal of Software Engineering and Applications
ISSN Online: 2327-249X
ISSN Print: 2327-2473
Current Issue: Vol.8, No.1, 2019
Dear Pena-Rios, A; Khosmood, F,
We are sending you this invitation to propose a special issue on valuable topics within the scope of American Journal of Software Engineering and Applications (http://www.ajsea.org).
Initate Special Issues
After reading your article "Immersive Learning Technologies: Research and Future Directions J.UCS Special Issue" published in JOURNAL OF UNIVERSAL COMPUTER SCIENCE, we believe that more in-depth researches can be conducted around this topic. For this reason, it's our pleasure to invite you to propose a special issue on a topic of your interest.
The Guides of Proposing Your Special Issues
The written proposals that include the introduction to the special issue and some key topics that papers could focus upon are requested to be submitted by the prospective lead guest editor.
If you have interests, please click the following link for the Proposal Form:
http://www.ajsea.org/download/60Form.doc
Your Role as the Lead Guest Editor for the Special Issue
If your special issue proposal is adopted, you will act as the Lead Guest Editor.
The Lead Guest Editor manages the entire Special Issue process, which comprises recruiting Guest Editors, composing a Special Issue proposal and regulating the peer review of submitted articles.
Benefits of Serving as the Lead Guest Editor of Your Special Issue
  1. One of your papers submitted to the special issue can enjoy free publication
  2. Receiving an electronic version of the Certificate of Honor
  3. You'll have the chance of being promoted to the Journal's Editor-in-Chief
  4. Keeping up with the recent research achievements via the review of manuscripts in your field
Any questions are welcome, please feel free to contact us.
Best regards,
Editorial Office of American Journal of Software Engineering and Applications
